mapper.sql: project_source d LEFT JOIN dataset_import di ON d.import_attempt=di.attempt AND d.key=di.dataset_key
mapper.select:
WITH src AS ( SELECT s.subject_dataset_key AS key, max(s.dataset_import_attempt) AS attempt FROM sector s WHERE s.dataset_key=#{datasetKey} GROUP BY s.subject_dataset_key )
SELECT FROM src JOIN dataset d2 ON d2.key = src.key LEFT JOIN dataset_archive d ON d.key = src.key AND d.import_attempt = src.attempt LEFT JOIN dataset_import di ON di.dataset_key = d.key AND di.attempt = d.import_attempt WHERE src.attempt != d2.import_attempt
UNION
SELECT FROM src JOIN dataset d ON d.key = src.key LEFT JOIN dataset_import di ON di.dataset_key = d.key AND di.attempt = d.import_attempt WHERE src.attempt = d.import_attempt OR src.attempt IS NULL
ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_source (key, dataset_key, import_attempt, , source_key, origin, created, modified) VALUES (#{key}, #{datasetKey}, #{importAttempt}, , #{sourceKey}, #{origin}::DATASETORIGIN, now(), now())
